# mirascope.core.xai.tool

<ApiType type="Module" />

## Description

The `XAITool` class for easy tool usage with xAI LLM calls.

<Info title="Usage">

[Tools](/docs/mirascope/learn/tools)

</Info>

## Module Attributes

| Name | Type | Description |
| ---- | ---- | ----------- |
| XAITool |  | A simple wrapper around `OpenAITool`.

Since xAI supports the OpenAI spec, we change nothing here. |
